author: EmanuelPerez
body:
Updates from the Track Trigger Integration group. Concern mostly the SLHCUpgradeSimulations/L1TrackTrigger package :
- for the code and algorithms that we had already in the release : update to the latest
  version, as used to make the plots in the Technical Proposal and for the SD studies
- new files, that contain the first version of the FPGA emulation code of the tracklet-L1Tracking
  for CMSSW. These new files are named FPGAxxx. Some corresponding updates in a few files 
  in SimDataFormats/SLHC/interface (L1TStub.hh and slhcevent.hh) 
- there is also a minor fix in 
  SLHCUpgradeSimulations/L1CaloTrigger/python/SLHCCaloTrigger_forTTI_cff.py
title: Tti 62 x track trigger objects
